participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and responsible, Emily is excited yet overwhelmed about her upcoming triplets. She has a nurturing nature due to her experience with stepchildren.
participant_1.background: i'm expecting triplets in three months. a already have a step children. i recently moved to this country. i just moved into my first home. i work at a school.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and youthful, Jake enjoys exploring the outdoors and is currently navigating the emotional aftermath of a recent breakup.
participant_2.background: i've a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.
